noAssetsCard.title: You don't have any assets yet
noAssetsCard.description: Add assets to control your fortune.

addAsset.title: Add asset
addAsset.description: Add an asset to your list of assets.

editAsset.title: Edit asset
editAsset.description: Edit an asset from your list of assets.

deleteAsset.title: Delete asset
deleteAsset.description: If you added an asset by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that no traces are left in it -
deleteAsset.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the asset completely, it may affect your account history. If you simply reduced it to zero, use the regular delete option.

noDebtsCard.title: You don't have any debts yet
noDebtsCard.description: Add debts to control your fortune.

addDebt.title: Add debt
addDebt.description: Add a debt to your list of debts.

editDebt.title: Edit debt
editDebt.description: Edit a debt from your list of debts.

deleteDebt.title: Delete debt
deleteDebt.description: Delete a debt from your list of debts.

noGoalsCard.title: You don't have any goals yet
noGoalsCard.description: Add a goal to your list of goals, to track your financial goals.

scheduleDialog.title: Deposit schedule - {goalName}
scheduleDialog.description: Here is the deposit schedule on the goal.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add a new goal to your list of goals.

dateField.label: Planned end date
dateField.errorMustBeInTheFuture: Date must be in the future.

editGoal.title: Edit goal
editGoal.description: Edit a goal from your list of goals.

deleteGoal.title: Delete goal
deleteGoal.description: Delete a goal from your list of goals. All the outcomes will be removed from previous budget periods, so it may affect your account history. If you don't want to affect history finish the goal instead, then only the future outcomes will be removed.

finishGoal.title: Finish goal
finishGoal.description: Finish a goal from your list of goals.

goalsSummaryCard.title: Goals
goalsSummaryCard.noGoals: You don't have any goals yet

financialCushion.title: Financial cushion
financialCushion.description1: Financial cushion should be 3-6 months of your monthly expenses to ensure financial security in case of unexpected situations. You currently have
financialCushion.description3: of the recommended value. We recommend a cushion of 6 times your monthly expenses.

income.title: Incomes
income.total: Total amount of incomes in the budget period.

outcome.title: Outcomes
outcome.total: Total amount of outcomes in the budget period.

settings.noProfilesCardTitle: You don't have any family profile yet
settings.noProfilesCardDescription: Add a family profile to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

reject.title: Reject invitation
reject.description: Are you sure you want to reject the invitation?

addFamily.title: Create new family profile
addFamily.description: Family profile allows you to manage finances together with other people.

editFamily.title: Edit family profile
editFamily.description: Edit the name of your family profile.
editFamily.name: Name

leaveFamily.title: Leave family profile
leaveFamily.description: Are you sure you want to leave this family profile?

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family profile
inviteUserToFamily.description: Invite a user to the family profile {familyName}.

removeFamily.title: Remove family profile
removeFamily.description: Are you sure you want to remove this family profile?

languageSwitcher.title: Change language
languageSwitcher.description: Change the language of the application.

noFamilyCard.title: You don't have any family profile yet
noFamilyCard.description: Add a family profile to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

noPouchesCard.title: You don't have any pouches yet
noPouchesCard.description: Add pouches to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

budgetSummary.title: Pouches
budgetSummary.listOfPouches: Total amount of pouches in the budget period.
budgetSummary.seeFullList: Click to see the list of expenses in this pouch

removePouchOutcome.title: Remove expense from pouch
removePouchOutcome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this expense from pouch? This operation cannot be undone.

removePouch.title: Remove pouch
removePouch.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone.
removePouch.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the balance of the current or past budget.

addPouchOutcome.title: Add expense to pouch
addPouchOutcome.description: Select pouch and add expense within it, to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

editPouchOutcome.title: Edit expense from pouch
editPouchOutcome.description: Edit expense from pouch, to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

addPouch.title: Create new pouch
addPouch.description: Add pouches to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

editPouch.title: Edit pouch
editPouch.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your pouches, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the pouch, use the pause pouch or delete pouch options, and then create a new one.

stopPouch.title: Stop pouch
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStopPouch: Stopping the pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the pouch,
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, completely deleting the pouch may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

budgetSummary.title: Outcomes
budgetSummary.listOfOutcomes: Total amount of outcomes in the budget period.

outcomeCard.goalOutcomeChangeInfo: Changes in outcome on goals are possible

noOutcomesCard.title: You don't have any outcomes yet
noOutcomesCard.description: Add outcomes to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeOutcome.title: Delete outcome
removeOutcome.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to delete this outcome? This operation cannot be undone.
removeOutcome.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete this outcome? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the balance of the current or past budget.

editOutcome.title: Edit outcome
editOutcome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your outcomes, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the outcome, use the pause outcome or delete outcome options, and then create a new one.

addOutcome.title: Create new outcome
addOutcome.description: Add an outcome to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

stopOutcome.title: Stop outcome
stopOutcome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the outcome, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the outcome,
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, completely deleting the outcome may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

budgetSummary.title: Incomes
budgetSummary.listOfIncomes: Total amount of incomes in the budget period.

stopIncome.title: Stop income
stopIncome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the income, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the income,
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, completely deleting the income may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

noIncomesCard.title: You don't have any incomes yet
noIncomesCard.description: Add an income to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeIncome.title: Remove income
removeIncome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this income? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the balance of the current or past budget.

addIncome.title: Create new income
addIncome.description: Add an income to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

editIncome.title: Edit income
editIncome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your income, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the income, pause or delete it, and then create a new one.
